30 #ifndef UTILITIES_SHARED_PTR_H
31 #define UTILITIES_SHARED_PTR_H
32 
33 // Use std::shared_ptr implementation available in C++11 if supported
34 #if __cplusplus > 199711L
35  //#pragma message("using std::shared_ptr")
36  #include <memory>
37  namespace Mutation {
38  template <typename T> using SharedPtr = std::shared_ptr<T>;
39  }
40 
41 // Otherwise, use our own implementation (probably slower)
42 #else
43 
44 #include <algorithm> // for std::swap
45 
46 namespace Mutation {
47 
51 template <typename T>
52 class SharedPtr
53 {
54 public:
55  SharedPtr() : mp_ref(NULL) { }
56 
60  explicit SharedPtr(T* ptr) :
61  mp_ref(new RefCount())
62  {
63  mp_ref->ptr = ptr;
64  mp_ref->count = 1;
65  }
66 
70  SharedPtr(const SharedPtr& other) :
71  mp_ref(other.mp_ref)
72  {
73  mp_ref->count++;
74  }
75 
80  ~SharedPtr()
81  {
82  // Protect against non-initialized pointers
83  if (mp_ref == NULL) return;
84 
85  // Reduce reference count and delete object
86  if (--(mp_ref->count) == 0) {
87  delete mp_ref->ptr;
88  delete mp_ref;
89  }
90  }
91 
93  SharedPtr<T>& operator = (SharedPtr<T> other) {
94  std::swap(mp_ref, other.mp_ref);
95  return *this;
96  }
97 
99  bool operator == (SharedPtr<T> other) {
100  return (mp_ref == other.mp_ref);
101  }
102 
104  T& operator*() const { return *(mp_ref->ptr); };
105 
107  T* operator->() const { return mp_ref->ptr; };
108 
109  template <class U, class V>
110  friend bool operator == (const SharedPtr<U>&, const SharedPtr<V>&);
111 
112  template <class U, class V>
113  friend bool operator != (const SharedPtr<U>&, const SharedPtr<V>&);
114 
115 private:
116 
117  // Helper class for managing the reference count.
118  struct RefCount
119  {
120  T* ptr;
121  int count;
122  };
123 
124 private:
125 
126  RefCount* mp_ref;
127 
128 }; // class SharedPtr
129 
130 // Compare two SharedPtr objects.
131 template <class T, class U>
132 bool operator == (const SharedPtr<T>& lhs, const SharedPtr<U>& rhs) {
133  return (lhs.mp_ref == rhs.mp_ref);
134 }
135 template <class T, class U>
136 bool operator != (const SharedPtr<T>& lhs, const SharedPtr<U>& rhs) {
137  return (lhs.mp_ref != rhs.mp_ref);
138 }
139 
140 
141 
142 } // namespace Mutation
143 
144 #endif // __cplusplus > 199711L
145 #endif // UTILITIES_SHARED_PTR_H
